incidents.name: Voice Insights Call Summaries Missing Branded Calling Related Fields

incident_updates.body: Voice Insights call summaries for Branded Calling calls are no longer missing the Branded Calling-related fields. The incident is now resolved.

Voice Insights call summaries for Branded Calling calls that ended after 10:39pm PST are missing Branded Calling-related fields. Our engineers are investigating the issue. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We've become aware of a potential issue with Voice Insights. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Unable to Log in to Twilio Console

incident_updates.body: Performance in Twilio Console login has been resolved is operating normally at this time.
Twilio Console performance issues are mitigated. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still experiencing degraded performance in Twilio Console. If you are experiencing the issue with login, as a work around please go to https://www.twilio.com/login. We are seeing recovery in Log in issues to Twilio Console. We will continue to monitor for system stability and will provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Twilio Event Streams Affected

incident_updates.body: Twilio Event Streams was degraded for 2 hours and 15 minutes between 06:15 and 08:30 Pacific Time on 02/10/2025 . During this period of time customers may have experienced fluctuating delays when receiving events. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Twilio Programmable Messaging and Verify API Affected

incident_updates.body: Twilio Programmable Messaging API and Verify were degraded for 1 minute between 06:03 and 06:04 Pacific Time on 10/02/2025. During this period of time, customers sending messages may have received 5xx's in API responses. The issue has now been resolved.
